body: Come on, when are we gonna see where husband finds his wife cheating and he kills her or tortures her. lol... I want something to read with a very satisfying ending like that.

@chioccolat yep probabily a typical plot, the blonde took her phone and probabily going to blackmail her to keep fuking her and the husband end up cuck, i think this artist ended this ntr long ago and he's just publishing little by little on fanbox
Ah nvm I just realized he's ALWAYS getting sus about her absence, might have a different outcome

Im starting to feel like this is really going to be just another typical ntr plot, nudes on husband's dms and he might end up being a cuck (tho I personally would love to see something interesting in the next release)

Also... She's taking a bath, so she will probably get away with everything and her family won't be questioning her much 😢 I wish at least her husband would confront her about being away for too long..

Thank you for the upload.
I wonder what that douche is going to do with Michiru's wallet and phone...
Probably getting her address and putting their phone numbers in her phone so they could resume their relationship after the trip.
